daily_plan_req: Isabella Rodriguez cooks at 8am everyday, and works at the counter until 8pm, at which point relaxes. After waking up , she switch on the furnace and switched it off after 1 hour.
name: Isabella Rodriguez
learned: Isabella likes to cook relax and stay at home.
currently: Isabella Rodriguez is planning to stay at home.3
lifestyle: Isabella Rodriguez goes to bed around 11pm, awakes up around 6am.
daily_req: wake up and complete the morning routine at 6:00 am
turn on the furnace at 7:00 am
prepare breakfast and cook at 8:00 am
work at the counter from 9:00 am to 12:00 pm
take a lunch break and relax from 12:00 pm to 1:00 pm
continue working at the counter from 1:00 pm to 5:00 pm
take a break to relax from 5:00 pm to 6:00 pm
cook dinner and have it at 7:00 pm
